title: johsmith27
author: johsmith27
created_time: May 14, 2023, 07:27:12 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 08:19:27 PM by johsmith27
content: *This token is not mine neither do I have any control of it, I just found it after months searching through so much tokens launched on the binance smart chain*As you guys know, we are living the early periods of the crypto market in which what determines if a coin/token thrives is not just utility but irrational hypes from internet communities. Just Look at Pepe and other meme-Coins------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I have found a fresh brand new token that has passed every safety checks I could do. and I show you.# Liquidity locked for 264 years on Unicrypt https://app.uncx.network/amm/pancake-v2/pair/0x19ad23F65298462d43705aEc23D285794AafA4f2# Ownership renounced by Devs# not many whales yet#Limited supply of only 21.000.000 tokens0% TAX FEE WHEN BUYING OR SELLING100% safe according to Gopluslabs website: https://gopluslabs.io/token-security/56/0x9469b3edddb18be8ad0459d4e2b8277c8ba1a464--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------A week old token With such low market of barely 4000$ dollars I think this token has much potential to go 30.000x or even more. A request was done yesterday to list it on coinmarketcap website.let me introduce the token:Name: Bitcoin Meme Chain: Binance Smart ChainMax supply: 21 millionContract: 0x9469b3edddb18be8ad0459d4e2b8277c8ba1a464Where to buy it: PancakeswapAs I Said before, the token is in its early stages. it's barely a week old. it has a twitter account and a telegram group. https://twitter.com/orangememecoin   https://t.me/+BTXCA4J6jH9lNzUxI genuinely think there is a good possibility of making a life changing money betting on this token. if it gets listed on coinmarket with 21 million supply, 1$ up to 5$ per token is realistic target. When I say life changing I mean getting retired from working.100$ dollars is worth the risk for me. if you guys want to check the charts here is the link: https://poocoin.app/tokens/0x9469b3edddb18be8ad0459d4e2b8277c8ba1a464Let be honest, We are all here to make profits and the best way is to get early as much as possible in the projects. What do you guys think? let's discuss about this project. I want to read some opinions.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: johsmith27 on May 14, 2023, 07:27:12 PM# Liquidity locked for 264 years on Unicrypt https://app.uncx.network/amm/pancake-v2/pair/0x19ad23F65298462d43705aEc23D285794AafA4f2There is only 860$ locked. It's not something anyone should care about. In fact, this is the only liquidity the token has. All in all, this is more of a disadvantage than an advantage of the project. And the fact that it's locked to 260 doesn't mean it can't be withdrawn by devs. All they have to do is to dump the rest of the tokens they have in this LP to get most of BUSD back.Quote from: johsmith27 on May 14, 2023, 07:27:12 PMAs you guys know, we are living the early periods of the crypto market in which what determines if a coin/token thrives is not just utility but irrational hypes from internet communities. Just Look at Pepe and other meme-CoinsIts not how it works. Some meme coins give such returns not because they have funny name and people wants to have it. its because they are created by people with great capital who manipulate valuations at the beggining of project and pay for huge marketing campaigns which manipulate people with the help of depth psychology by showing huge pumps as an argument that it is a good project and that it will continue to grow.My description has nothing to do with the token you bring here- not even a fake utility, no website, no marketing campaign, no capital ($800 is not capital). So far its not even worth 4000$ because everyone can create such token after 1 hour youtube tutorial and 5 min of coding.Quote from: johsmith27 on May 14, 2023, 07:27:12 PMWhen I say life changing I mean getting retired from working.Just stop with this BS.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: To be honest, if you were wanna writing crappy article about your token and this is not the right place. You just found your own token, and that's it. Your main intention was to promoting your shit scam meme token and no more. You have been introducing the crappy token that can be easily identified as the scam token with no interest from the crypto users. You shall withdraw your own liquidity that already added to your crappy token.

What do you guys think? let's discuss about this project. I want to read some opinions.So checking out the chart and seeing the project that its 10 days old as of this writing and checking out those candles which it did make out  some  pump and dump on its first day. Is this really something new on bsc-based meme coins? No its not. It wont really be that shocking nor surprising on the time that you would really tending to look around on BSC space and i do really tend to avoid up that 0/0 tax which this is where rugpulls do usually happen. Why? How can the team or dev would be able to make money if they arent really getting any tax on buy and sell? This is why being that sensible itself or having the common sense would really be saving up yourself on getting scammed just because people would really be diving in into something having that zero tax and same goes into those  coins which are gettingin lined with the current hype. I was aware about orange but the hype now is sticking into cartoon characters.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: johsmith27 on May 14, 2023, 07:27:12 PMName: Bitcoin Meme Chain: Binance Smart ChainMax supply: 21 millionI know there are shitcoin but this here is way past the shitcoin level. Bitcoin meme? Where did the creativity go?So you sat down thinking all night and day for a couple of weeks and this is the best you came up with?if anyone fall into a trap buying such a token, then they deserve it as a punishment for their stupidity

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: Question to the author: do you seriously think that this will be of interest to someone? The token has no real use, it even has a strange name, since the token on another network calls bitcoin a meme. It's already ridiculous if I want to spend money nowhere, it's easier to give it to a random passerby.

comments.author: bitkanu
comments.body: seriously? Bitcoin Meme is among the worst name i've ever heard for a meme just put a meme word behind bitcoin, that's outright silly and I think your $100 bet now turning into thin air as you have made the worst decision ever of investing in this shit coin if you're not the one who created it.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: have same thoughts like many above, this coin is total shit coin, also the fact that it present 0 taxes as one of it advantage is silly because before these taxes imposed on certain coin doesn't make sense at all.I mean you're literally buying a coin that gonna steals your money everytime you execute some transaction using that contract it's just another level of ridiculous honestly.more over we aren't short supply of these meme coins in general. so many meme coin generated everyday none of them have meaningful use other than speculative tool for some, but here's the thing.why don't we just keep using the same already prominent and famous meme coin instead of starting over with different meme coin again if it's just for speculative tool?

comments.author: RussianEnglishTranslation
comments.body: I don't trade on BNB chain anymore, too many scams. I hodl my 0xMR there and farm Cake on Pancakeswap.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: Anyone can wager on any coin they want, there is nothing wrong with this and if 100 dollars is not a lot of money for you then you are free to do anything. The logic behind it and the reasons are not good enough for me to invest, there are plenty of those and I can make even the worst project sound like it is something good.LUNC is just a mockup off the luna that was hacked and people lost billions, I can still make LUNC look good if I wrote it like this as well, it all depends on how good you are at writing but that doesn't make the token go up. This is why I do not think that I would do the same, I will stay away from it, but that doesn't mean that I would tell anyone else to do the same, if you think there is a chance, then you gotta try it at least.
